version_name: 6.0.0:Say goodbye to "China Air Quality Index". Introducing our new name "Air Matters"
6.0.0:Say goodbye to "China Air Quality Index". Introducing our new name "Air Matters"

version_description:
- New look for Dashboard and data history.
- Added Pollen Data in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
- Support Philips AC1214 air purifier.
- Improved VoiceOver support.
- Improved App launch time.
- Fixed a bug preventing response when tapping on dashboard.

Recent updates:

- Redesigned Apple Watch app.
- Fixed a bug that prevents settings syncing to Apple Watch from iPhone.
- Added support for Philips AC2889 Air Purifier in US and Canada.
- Added “Frequently Asked Questions” in settings.

- New look for Dashboard and data history.
- Added Pollen Data in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
- Support Philips AC1214 air purifier.
- Improved VoiceOver support.
- Improved App launch time.
- Fixed a bug preventing response when tapping on dashboard.

Recent updates:

- Redesigned Apple Watch app.
- Fixed a bug that prevents settings syncing to Apple Watch from iPhone.
- Added support for Philips AC2889 Air Purifier in US and Canada.
- Added “Frequently Asked Questions” in settings.

- Added Air Quality Index standards for Netherlands and Europe (CAQI).

- New setting: choose primary index from air quality, allergy risk, or let our servers decide for you automatically.
- Added switches for air quality / allergy alert subscriptions.
- Now you can set the app icon to “Mask Man”, the old icon we used in 2011-2016. (iOS 10.3 required)
- Fixed remote connection and history data displaying issues for Philips purifiers.

- New setting: choose primary index from air quality, allergy risk, or let our servers decide for you automatically.

- Fixed remote connection and history data displaying issues for Philips purifiers.

# Recent Updates

- Added customized interface for push notifications.
- Fixed display issues after switching air quality index standard.

- Full support for iOS 12, watchOS 5, and new models of iPhone and Apple Watch.
- We redesigned the Apple Watch app, providing much more information including forecast of weather and air quality.
- Full support for Siri Shortcuts, to help you check the air quality of your current location or your saved place / connected air quality devices via Siri.
- Now you can share the data of your connected air quality monitor to your family or friends via QR code.

# Recent updates:

- Full support for iOS 12, watchOS 5, and the new generation of iPhone and Apple Watch.

- Full support for Siri Shortcuts, to help you check the air quality of your current location or your saved places / connected air quality devices via Siri.
- Now you can share the data of your connected air quality monitor to your family or friends via QR code.
- Improved Siri support for Philips Purifiers.
